mapper.insert: insert into user(username, password, role, age, first_name, last_name, email_address, sex, phone_number) values(#{username},#{password},#{role},#{age},#{firstName},#{lastName},#{emailAddress},#{sex},#{phoneNumber});
mapper.delete: delete from user where username=#{username} and length(username)=length(#{username});
mapper.select: select * from user where username=#{username} and length(username)=length(#{username});
